column1: Subject Matter Specialist - Core Airport Apps (AODB specially )
column2: ??Candidate will be responsible for understanding & evaluating the AODB (Amadeus,Resa etc) implemented at some of our key airports that we manage as well as evaluating alternate AODB?? as secondary AODB?? in critical Airport System Implementations. Required Candidate profile Candidate should be an accomplished Aviation Role with 15+ years of demonstrated exp. in Airport Operational Systems & IT projects delivery in significant green field & brown field airports projects.
column11: Airport Operations, Aviation, Project Management, Airport System Implementation, Troubleshooting, System Integration
